item.title: Southwark cleaning bags, 11th July

item.title: 11 July Morning Glorious rubbish pile…been a while!, 11th July
item.description:
11 July - Morning Glorious rubbish pile I missed you yesterday although I know you were there. No point moving down further to outside the Price venture Ltd building we all know where you’re coming from!!! This is a permanent problem, please can the council investigate.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 69, Charlton Church Lane, Charlton, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Derbis, 11th July
item.description:
The streets, pavements, and road edges in the area are very dirty, with a noticeable buildup of dust, small debris, and litter. This has not been cleaned for a long time, creating an unpleasant and potentially unhealthy environment. The issue is especially visible along kerbsides and affects both drivers and pedestrians. Regular street cleaning is needed.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): North Circular Road, Fallow Corner, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: 9 July lone rubbish bag, 11th July
item.description:
9 July - just a lone rubbish bag today were the owners struggling to fill our streets today I wonder. This is a permanent problem, please can the council investigate and put a stop to it.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 69, Charlton Church Lane, Charlton, London
Report on FixMyStreet
